text:
We've some unique traditions #Holi
1. We make pakodas today & add coins in some of them. If you are lucky enough then you get that pakoda along with 1/2/5 rupee coin. As kids, we used to be quite excited
2. We don't cook tomorrow. We make the food today 
& have it tomorrow
